title: Gravity Chamber

Gravity Chamber





Gravity Chamber Python Code
2023




Python Package: dcurves


Decision Curve Analysis Python Package
2023
Diagnostic and prognostic models are typically evaluated with measures of accuracy that do not address clinical consequences. Decision-analytic techniques allow assessment of clinical outcomes but often require additional information that may be cumbersome to apply to models that yield continuous results. Decision Curve Analysis is a method for evaluating and comparing prediction models that incorporates clinical consequences, requiring only the dataset on which the models are tested, and can be applied to models that have either continuous or dichotomous results.
The dca function performs decision curve analysis for binary and survival outcomes. Review the DCA tutorial for a detailed walkthrough of various applications.




Sites


Decision Curve Analysis Site
2023
I made this site for my boss’ statistical method “Decision Curve Analysis”. This method is used to evaluate prediction models, molecular markers, and tests, based on clinical consequences.

I made these sites for my contacts at the UN running NGOs. These are simple sites that I’m iterating on as necessary, and I do this pro bono to help out those who are dedicating themselves to noble causes.
